name: sourcerenderer-web-site
description: Render source engine maps in the browser

scripts.build: cd ../lib && wasm-pack build -t web -d ../www/dist/wasm_lib && cd ../www && tsc && tsc -p tsconfig.service_worker.json && cp ./index.html ./dist/ && cp ./manifest.json ./dist/
scripts.start: npm run copy_src && npm run build && http-server ./dist
